title: LOST MY account PLS HELP
body: guys i lost my account, ive gotten into LOL for a few months, i love this game sooo much, someone hacked me, i cant change my password because he has his gmail as my accout..... so i cant send a sode to change it.... is this the end for me and this game??

replies.body: i tried to, i think it went, thanks for the help!!
